item.description:
Your $5 pay-to-play donation will go toward the cost of pool tables and grub.

 

There's a $25 gift card up for grabs too! (1 winner)

Anyone who tags a beer & the location using the RedPint mobile beer iPhone app during the meetup will be eligible to win a surprise prize! (1 winner)

 

Got questions? Send 'em my way via email or Twitter.
item.why: Snow piles are higher than our heads. Boston's been dumped on quite a bit this winter. Let's meet up on February 5th to stick it to winter by hitting around a few pool balls and tossing back a few pints.
item.name: "Stick It To Winter" Beer & Billiards Meetup
